tool.name: MSA of cg/wgMLST database
tool.command: wgMLST msa #if str($genes) -f '${genes}' #end if #if $realign --realign #end if '${database}' > '${msa}' #if $log 2> '${logfile}' #end if

param.name: genes
param.label: Genes list
param.help: File containing list of genes to extract

tool.help:
**What it does**
Compute Multiple Sequence Alignment from a wgMLST DATABASE
**Options**
-f, --file FILENAME File containing list of coregenes to extract (default:all coregenes). -r, --realign Realign genes with same length (Default:No).
